body_content.explanation: a failure to measure the size, amount, value, or importance of something correctly:
examples: The cases involve allegations of mismeasurement and undervaluation of gas volumes on which royalty payments are due.
Mis-measurement of tariffs is also captured in the model.

body_content.explanation: an incorrect value relating to the size, amount, or importance of something:
examples: These are inadvertent mismeasurements and miscalculations.
The lower the quality of the image, the higher the chance of mis-measurements.
